author: Dianne Buckner
title: Canadian hospitals getting 'creative' to expand COVID-19 care facilities
description: With many experts predicting a surge in COVID-19 cases here in the next couple of weeks, many Canadian hospitals are looking for constructive solutions for expanding care facilities.
content:
The world marvelled at China's ability to build a two-storey, 645,000-square-foot hospital in 10 days.
With many experts predicting a surge in COVID-19 cases here in the next couple of weeks, many Canadian hospitals are also looking for constructive solution… [+6517 chars]
